name: Peak Personage Stealth Rogue, Shojodoji
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Bind two cards with "Stealth" in their card names from soul], choose two of your opponent's (RC), bind all of the cards on the chosen (RC), and your opponent puts those cards into their hand at the end of that turn.[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put two rear-guards into soul], choose a card with "Stealth" in its card name from your bind zone, call it to (RC), and if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, that called unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: I'll let you know since you don't, I am the great invincible Shojodoji!

name: Stealth Dragon, Unpreceden
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) by a card's ability, if you have a vanguard with "Tamayura" or "Shojodoji" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and draw a card.[CONT](RC):If two or more of your cards were put from (RC) into your soul this turn, this unit gets [Power] +10000.
flavor: Should you wish for it, I'd make even the rogues of hell bend over!

name: Silver Thorn Dragon Tamer, Luquier
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Put a card from hand into soul], choose up to three unit cards with different grades from your soul, call them to (RC), and if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, those called units get [Power] +5000 until end of turn.[AUTO](VC):At the end of your turn, [COST][put two rear-guards into soul], and draw a card.
flavor: It is said that Progenitor Dragon Tamers made everyone kneel before them.

name: Silver Thorn, Rising Dragon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][put a card from hand into soul], and draw a card. [CONT](RC):During your turn, if you have a vanguard with "Luquier" in its card name, and two or more of your units were placed on (RC) from soul this turn, this unit gets [Power] +10000, and if four or more were placed, it gets [Power] +10000.
flavor: The performance of a demonic dragon of thorns that traps the audience in a whirlpool of excitement.

name: Monster Creator, Arkhite
effect: [AUTO](VC):When your rear-guard with "Monster" in its card name is placed, [COST][put a card with the same card name as that card from order zone on the bottom of deck], and that unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, if your order zone has a Research card, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and activate all of the effects below.・If your order zone has three or more Research cards, choose up to one of your rear-guards with "Monster" in its card name, and put it into your order zone.・Look at the top seven cards of your deck, choose up to one unit card with "Monster" in its card name from among them, call it to (RC), and shuffle your deck.
flavor: Don't worry, as I've created you to be perfect.

name: Reception Monster, Wavyloss
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a vanguard with "Arkhite" in its card name or [Glitter] with "Eva" in its card name on your (VC), [COST][Soul-Blast 2], and draw a card.[CONT](RC):During your turn, if your order zone has three or more Research cards, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: Wom-wom-wom, it's the reception report.

name: Omniscience Regalia, Minerva
effect: [CONT](VC):During your turn, if your soul has a grade 3 card with "Regalia" in its card name, all of your front row units get [Power] +5000.[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1], look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your soul.[AUTO](VC)[1/turn]:At the end of the battle this unit attacked, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 3 & discard a card with only 《Genesis》 for its clan from hand], [Stand] this unit, and it gets drive -1 until end of turn.
flavor: That day, the omniscient goddess descended upon the world.

name: Regalia of Wisdom, Angelica
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, if you have a vanguard with "Minerva" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. Then, [COST][put this unit into soul], and [Counter-Charge 1].
flavor: A regalia that masters wisdom becomes the light that brings forth omniscience.

name: Blue Storm Dragon, Maelstrom
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Discard a card from hand], choose a unit card with only 《Aqua Force》 for its clan or a ＜Tear Dragon＞ from your soul, call it to (RC), it gets "[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, and it is the first battle of this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and [Stand] this unit." until end of turn, and at the end of that turn, put it into your soul.[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, if it is the fourth battle of this turn or more, draw a card, choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.
flavor:
The blue dragon desires order in the world.
The result of that is the manifestation of absolute justice.

name: Tidal Assault
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your vanguards with "Maelstrom" in its card name, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, if it is the second battle of this turn, and you have a [Stand] vanguard with "Maelstrom" in its card name, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and [Stand] this unit.
flavor: The crashing of high waves becomes the water that calls forth the great storm.

name: Undoubting Flame Sword, Radylina
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the beginning of your main phase, If you do not have a Momokke token on your (RC), call up to one Momokke token to (RC).[Glitter]-Rorowa (Active if your vanguard is a [Glitter] with "Rorowa" in its card name)[AUTO](Hand):At the end of the battle your unit with "Radylina" in its card name attacked, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][retire a rear-guard with "Radylina" in its card name and a Momokke token], call this card to (RC), and that unit's [Power] increases by the [Power] of the Momokke token retired for this ability's cost until end of turn.
flavor: Strength is to never doubt yourself!

name: It's Show Time! Ririmi
effect: [AUTO]:When this card is put from soul into your drop during your turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and call this card to the back row (RC) in the same column as your front row unit with "Rarami" in its card name.[Glitter]-Tamayura (Active if your vanguard is a [Glitter] with "Tamayura" in its card name)[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted, put all of your rear-guards in the same column as this unit into your soul. If a unit with "Rarami" in its card name was put into your soul by this effect, and you did not [Counter-Charge] this turn, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and [Counter-Charge 1]. (Putting into soul is mandatory)
flavor: Let's make this bloom as the greatest show!

name: Ladies and Gentlemen! Rarami
effect: [AUTO]:When this card is put from soul into your drop during your turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and call this card to the back row (RC) in the same column as your front row unit with "Ririmi" in its card name.[Glitter]-Tamayura (Active if your vanguard is a [Glitter] with "Tamayura" in its card name)[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted, put all of your rear-guards in the same column as this unit into your soul. If a unit with "Ririmi" in its card name was put into your soul by this effect, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. (Putting into soul is mandatory)
flavor: It's the start of the greatest show!

name: Go Ahead, Mikani
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), you may [Soul-Charge 1].[ACT](RC):If your vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][put this unit into soul], choose up to one grade 3 card with "Mikani" in its card name from your soul, and call it to (RC).[Glitter]-Kheios (Active if your vanguard is a [Glitter] with "Kheios" in its card name)[CONT](Soul):When you would count the number of different card names in your soul for your card's ability, all "Go Ahead, Mikani" in your soul each count as a different card name.
flavor: Complete annihilation, as per your orders.

name: Great Sword of Fierce Black Flame, Obscudeid
effect: [CONT](RC)/(GC):If your order zone has three or more set orders, this unit gets [Power] +5000/[Shield] +5000. (Active on opponent's turn too)[Glitter]-Eva (Active if your vanguard is a [Glitter] with "Eva" in its card name)[CONT](RC):If this unit was placed on (RC) by your card's ability this turn, and your order zone has three or more Research cards, when this unit would attack, it battles all of your opponent's front row units.
flavor: I'll bet all of my pride on this one attack.

name: Pink Moth Girl, Maple
effect: [AUTO]Drop:When your grade 3 or greater vanguard is placed during the ride phase, if you persona rode this turn, and you do not have "Pink Moth Girl, Maple" on your (RC), you may call this card to (RC). If you called it, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.[Glitter]-Thegrea (Active if your vanguard is a [Glitter] with "Thegrea" in its card name)[AUTO]Back Row(RC):When your unit in the same column as this unit [Stand], you may [Stand] this unit. If you do, at the end of that turn, retire this unit.
flavor: Heh heh! It's because I'm number one!

name: Stealth Dragon, Jakumetsu Arcs
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from bind zone, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose a card from your opponent's bind zone, and put it on the bottom of their deck.
flavor: Nock the arrow of death. And slay the enemy general's head.

name: Staticrack Dragon
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your other unit is placed on a (RC) in the same column as this unit during your turn, that placed unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: The raging lightning bestows mesmerizing power.

name: Scarlet of Fluttering Evanescent Life
effect: Play this with [COST][Soul-Blast 2] if you have a vanguard with "Tamayura" in its card name!Choose up to one unit card with "Ririmi" in its card name and up to one unit card with "Rarami" in its card name each from your drop, and call them to (RC).
flavor: The ring spun by life will purify all evil.

name: Silver Thorn, Breathing Dragon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on a back row (RC) from soul, if you have a vanguard with "Luquier" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your vanguards, and it gets "[CONT](VC):All of your front row rear-guards get [Power] +5000." until end of turn.
flavor: Time does not change the invigoration brought forth by the sparkling flames.

name: Luxual Songster
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from soul, until end of turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000, and "[AUTO](RC):When the attack this unit boosted hits, [COST][put this unit into soul], and draw a card.".
flavor: A gorgeous singing voice provides yet another layer of color to the circus.

name: Song of Extolment Can Be Heard
effect: Play this if you have a vanguard with "Kheios" in its card name!Choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn. Choose three normal units from your drop, put them into your soul, and put this card on the bottom of your deck.
flavor: Extol your desires.

name: Abent Robust
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1], search your deck for up to one set order and reveal it, and if your order zone has a card with the same card name as that card, put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck.[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, choose two set orders with the same card name from your order zone. If you chose two cards, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle.
flavor: The development of a nation is accelerated by the fervor born from entertainment.

name: Volcano Monster, Goukaterra
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards with grade less than or equal to the number of Research cards in your order zone, and retire it. [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if your order zone has three or more Research cards, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle.
flavor: That scorching heat will burn down the frigid earth and white tranquil sky.

name: The World is a Blue Research Lab
effect: (After a set order is played, put it into your order zone)Play this if your vanguard is a [Glitter] with "Eva" in its card name![AUTO]:When this card is put into the order zone, look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to one card from among them, call it to (RC), and shuffle your deck. [ACT]Order Zone[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1 & Rest three research cards in order zone], choose one of your [Glitter] units, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: To know of all of creation, heaven and earth, everything in existence!

name: Sword Saint Knight Dragon, Gramgrace
effect: [CONT](VC):Your persona ride also increases the [Power] of your back row units.[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], draw a card, choose a card from your hand, call it to your back row center (RC), and until end of turn, that unit can attack from the back row, and gets [Power] +10000.[AUTO](VC):At the end of the battle your back row center rear-guard attacked, put that unit into your soul, and draw a card.
flavor: Oh blade of mine, come forth from the blue sky. Nievern Reinforce--!

name: Witch of Ravens, Chamomile
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by a unit with only 《Genesis》 for its clan, look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to two cards from among them, put them into your soul, and shuffle your deck.[AUTO]:When this card is put from soul into your drop during your turn, if you have a vanguard with "Minerva" in its card name, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and call this card to (RC).
flavor: A magic of resonance for the soul that goes beyond time.

name: Magic of Alteration, Turnarr
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked while boosted, if your damage zone has three or more face down cards, [COST][put this unit into soul], and [Counter-Charge 1].
flavor: Won't you try a little harder? I'll provide support!

name: Dark Magenta of Blooming Hatred
effect: (After a set order is played, put it into your order zone)Play this if you have a vanguard with "Thegrea" in its card name![AUTO]:When this card is put into your order zone, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and draw a card.[ACT]Order Zone:If you have a grade 3 vanguard with "Thegrea" in its card name, [COST][put this card into drop], choose up to one grade 3 or greater card with "Thegrea" in its different card name from your vanguard from your hand, and ride it as [Stand].
flavor: Both justice and integrity are detestable false pretenses.

name: Tear Knight, Emilios
effect: [AUTO]:When this card is placed on (RC) with your other grade 1 or less rear-guard, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], draw a card, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: With the entrusted feelings in their hearts, the soldiers sharpen their swords.

name: Wheel Assault
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted, if you have a vanguard with "Maelstrom" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose two of your rear-guards, and swap their positions.
flavor: A strategy that has both evolved and deepened will overcome any storm.

name: To The Shining Stage!
effect: Play this with [COST][Soul-Blast 1] if you have a vanguard with "Rorowa" in its card name!Choose a card from your drop with grade less than or equal to your vanguard, and call it to (RC). Then, if you have a rear-guard with "Radylina" in its card name, you may call a Plant token to (RC). (Plant tokens are grade 0/[Power] 5000/[Critical] 1 and have boost)
flavor: We're the new idols, Rorowa and Rady! Nice to meet you!

name: Gratias Gradale
effect: Regalis Piece(You may only have one Regalis Piece in your deck, and use it a total of one time in a fight)Play this if you have a grade 3 vanguard with persona ride and you did not ride this turn!Activate persona ride. (Draw a card, all of your front row units get [Power] +10000 this turn, and you are regarded to have persona rode)
flavor: Somewhere among the stars, the primordial blue fills the cup and waits for the seeker.

name: Frying Shot Dragon, Crumstego
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], your opponent chooses three cards from their drop, and binds them. If they could not bind three cards, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle.
flavor: To not leave any dust. That is his style.

name: Sublimate Lance Dragon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 2], choose one of your opponent's (RC), and bind all of the cards on the chosen (RC).
flavor: You lowlifes who invade the empire. Quickly scatter, explode, and burn yourselves up!

name: Spear Knight of Scales, Limzviit
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is retired from (RC) or (GC), if your vanguard is a [Glitter], you may put this card into your soul.
flavor: My spear is my pride! Like the breath of a dragon that never falters!

name: Stealth Fiend, Koumaaun
effect: [AUTO]:When this card is placed on (RC) from hand, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose a card from your opponent's bind zone, and you may put it on the bottom of their deck. If you did not put a card, choose up to one unit card with "Stealth" in its card name and grade less than or equal to your vanguard from your bind zone, and call it to (RC).
flavor: The growl and flames that ward off maliciousness can drive evil away and call on friends.

name: Silver Thorn Marionette, Lilian
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by a unit with only 《Pale Moon》 for its clan, [Soul-Charge 1], choose a card from your soul, and put it into your hand.[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) or put on (GC), if you have a vanguard with "Luquier" in its card name, this unit gets [Power] +5000/[Shield] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: The marionette will continue to dance until the day these bonds become disconnected.

name: Diverse Wild Master, Honoratio
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if your soul has eight or more cards with different card names, this unit gets "Boost", and [Power] +5000.[CONT](RC)/(GC):If your soul has eight or more cards with different card names, this card can intercept from the back row, and gets [Shield] +5000.
flavor: No one is allowed to catch up to the diversity of art of a technical Wild Master.

name: Brick Guardner
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put from (RC) into your soul, if your damage zone has four or more face down cards, [COST][bind this card], and [Counter-Charge 1].
flavor: A treasure that can be easily obtained holds no value. Isn't that right?

name: Hurry and Join, Loyal Servants
effect: This card can be played from the soul, and play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1] if you have a vanguard with "Luquier" in its card name!Choose one of your rear-guards, and it gets "[AUTO](RC):When your vanguard attacks, [COST][put this unit into soul], choose a card with only 《Pale Moon》 for its clan and grade less than or equal to your vanguard from your soul, and call it to (RC)." until end of turn.
flavor: Silver Thorn―― That is a synonym of the everlasting "greatest stage".

name: One Who Peruses the Proto Galaxy
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if your order zone has two or more set orders, you may [Soul-Charge 1].
flavor: Investigate. There is truth buried below the sediments.

name: Strahl Winthose
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle for every two Research cards in your order zone.
flavor: The new weapon that came from repeated research will pierce the light at the end of the galaxy――!

name: Windstorm Monster, Cyclogaade
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), choose a unit card with "Monster" in its card name from your drop, and you may put it into your order zone.[CONT](GC):If your order zone has two or more Research cards, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.
flavor: A gale is better than a thousand blades.

name: Torrential Energy Research
effect: (After a set order is played, put it into your order zone)[AUTO]:When this card is put into the order zone, reveal the top five cards of your deck, choose up to two cards with "Monster" in their card names from among them, put one of them into your hand, put one of them into your drop, and shuffle your deck.[ACT]Order Zone:[COST][[Rest] this card], choose a card with "Monster" in its card name from your drop, and put it into your order zone.
flavor: Explore, this is the call of the great earth.

name: Knight of Excision, Diorruing
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if your vanguard has only one clan, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & discard a card from hand], choose a card with only the same clan as your vanguard's clan from your drop, and put it into your hand.
flavor: An organization needs to purify itself by excising what's redundant.

name: Hammerbreaking Knight, Sadie
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) by a card's ability, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], draw a card, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Now, who do I need to beat up!

name: Universal Angel
effect: [AUTO]:When this card is discarded from hand during your turn, if your vanguard is a [Glitter], [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and draw a card.
flavor: Hope is always within grasp.

name: Wisdom of Beginning That Cleared The World
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1]!Draw two cards, choose two cards from your hand, call each of them with grade less than or equal to your vanguard to (RC), and discard them if not.
flavor: The regalia's light tears apart the darkness, and is said to have illuminated the future.

name: Shoreline Raise Dragon
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if it is the fourth battle of this turn or more, if your order zone has a Blue Storm Armada, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle, and at the end of that battle, put this unit into your soul. (This effect is mandatory)
flavor: May this strike be the end of the strife.

name: Ripening Dragon
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your rear-guard is retired by a card's ability during your turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: The season of harvest is right ahead. Eat more and grow big.

name: Titan of Greenflow Patrol
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your other unit [Stand] by a card's ability, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: The green current circulates. The green giant stands tall.

name: Storm of Judgment
effect: (After a set order is played, put it into the order zone)Play this if you have a vanguard with "Maelstrom" in its card name![AUTO]:When this card is put into your order zone, activate all of the effects below.・Choose up to one unit card with only 《Aqua Force》 for its clan or a ＜Tear Dragon＞ from your drop, and call it to (RC).・Choose one of your rear-guards, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn for each other "Storm of Judgment" in your order zone.
flavor: The legendary Blue Storm Armada is said to be in complete control of the battlefield.

name: Thunderclap Dragon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if your vanguard is a [Glitter], [Soul-Charge 1], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Clear the way to the future you wish for with this soulful strike.

name: World-shaper Stealth Rogue, Shojodoji
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to two normal units with "Stealth" in their card names from among them, reveal them, put one of the revealed cards into your soul, call the remaining revealed cards to (RC), and shuffle your deck.[ACT](Bind zone):If you have a grade 2 or greater vanguard with "Stealth" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and call this card to (RC).
flavor: There are no digressions to the road of rogues.

name: Lightning Bullet of Dust Storm, Sadiid
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) or put on (GC), if you have more rear-guards than your opponent, this unit gets [Power] +5000/[Shield] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Try to dodge this barrage if you can!

name: Vulkaan Golem
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][put a normal unit with the same card name as any of your units from drop on the bottom of deck], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Boiling and melting lava, waiting for the time to erupt.

name: Sakura Romance Stealth Rogue, Shojodoji
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to two normal units with "Stealth" in their card names from among them, reveal them, put one of the revealed cards into your soul, bind the remaining revealed cards, and shuffle your deck.[ACT](Bind zone):If you have a grade 1 or greater vanguard with "Stealth" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and call this card to (RC).
flavor: With the sakura grudge of your heart believing in tomorrow, slice them to pieces with all your might!

name: Heat Breath Wyvern
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts a [Glitter], this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle.
flavor: The fireball it releases grazes the great earth, and creates a path into the enemy's formation.

name: Can't Quit Sake Stealth Rogue, Shojodoji
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: Sake is the water of life, and he who defies leads a reckless life.

name: Return to The Other Shore
effect: Play this if you have a vanguard with "Shojodoji" in its card name!You and your opponent both choose one of their (RC), bind all of the cards on the chosen (RC), and at the end of that turn, put each of their cards bound by this effect into their hands. If both you and your opponent's cards were bound by this effect, put this card into the soul.
flavor: The rain will fall. The rain of the annihilation of demons.

name: Circulate Acrobat, Urseltje
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from soul by the ability of your vanguard with "Luquier" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and [Counter-Charge 1].
flavor: The silvery glossy blade goes around, bathing in the inexhaustible cheers of the crowd.

name: Record Break Dragon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to one card with a different card name from the cards in your soul from among them, put it into your soul, and shuffle your deck.
flavor: Oh undiscovered elites, let us break the records together.

name: Enmities Dragon
effect: [AUTO]:When this card is put into your soul by a card's ability during your turn, if your vanguard is a [Glitter], choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Oh thick and intense grudge of mine, carve yourself into the depths of the soul.

name: Trapeze Actress
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your vanguards with "Luquier" in its card name, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.[AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), if you have a vanguard with "Luquier" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Shield] +5000 until end of that battle.
flavor: With adoration as motivation, she climbs her way up to the seat of a star.

name: Abrupt Leaver
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if your unit was placed on (RC) from soul this turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000. (Includes this unit)
flavor: Reap the radiance out of life.

name: Silver Thorn Assistant, Irina
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by a unit with only 《Pale Moon》 for its clan, look at the top seven cards of your deck, choose up to one card from among them, put it into your soul, and shuffle your deck.[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a vanguard with "Luquier" in its card name, you may [Soul-Charge 1].
flavor: A guide that invites you to a dream time that never fades.

name: Dimness Fiend
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, if your soul has five or more cards, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle.
flavor: In the deep night when all are asleep, the demon wanders in search of a sacrifice.

name: Silver Thorn Assistant, Ionela
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: Even now, mysterious tales of Silver Thorn are told on nights of the pale moon.

name: Hadron Axe Dragon
effect: [AUTO](RC):When a Research card is put into your order zone, [COST][retire this unit], and [Counter-Charge 1].
flavor: You need the resolve to lose something for a reformation.

name: Sleeping Protector, Arkhite
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed by riding from "Monster Soul-searching, Arkhite", search your deck for up to one Research card, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor: I want to tell you that I love you sooner.

name: Fist Cannon Dragon, Diemetria Dragon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][discard a card from hand], look at the same number of cards from the top of your deck as the number of different Research cards in your order zone, choose a card from among them, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor: The days you spend training will become your support during combat.

name: High Flight Conversion, Silberkes
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if your order zone has three or more different set orders, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle.
flavor: The silver wings descend from the sky. Innocent lives must be saved.

name: Itinerant Automaton
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, if your order zone has three or more different set orders, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle.
flavor: The patrol security makes its rounds without rest, regardless of the time of the day.

name: Monster Soul-searching, Arkhite
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed by riding from "Short Rest, Arkhite", search your deck for up to one Research card, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor: A monster's soul shines beautifully, even in the wilderness.

name: Cerulean Heavy Gunner
effect: [AUTO]:When this card is discarded from hand during your turn, if your vanguard is a grade 3 or greater [Glitter], [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and you may call this card to a back row (RC). If you called it, this unit cannot attack until end of turn.
flavor: Slipping in to the gambling room and snatching the best moment.

name: Short Rest, Arkhite
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: See you later.

name: Coexistence Dragon
effect: [CONT]Deck/(RC):If your vanguard is a [Glitter], this card gets [Power] +5000/grade -1. (Active on opponent's turn too)
flavor: That heart which sways between good and evil. It must be watched at all times.

name: Relentless Dragon
effect: [ACT](RC):[COST][Put this unit into your soul], look at the top card of your deck, and call it to (RC) or discard it.
flavor: The weak is redundant. Only those who can follow are needed.

name: Knight of Harrowing Fear, Dubthach
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from deck by your vanguard's ability, until end of turn, this unit gets "Boost", and [Power] +5000.
flavor: I'll swing the sword that I trust wherever we are.

name: Witch of Frogs, Melissa
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by a unit with only 《Genesis》 for its clan, look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to two cards from among them, put them into your soul, and shuffle your deck.[AUTO]:When this card is put into your drop from soul, if you have a vanguard with "Minerva" in its card name, call this card to a back row (RC). If you called it, you may [Soul-Charge 1].
flavor: The magic of the soul of languages that rocks the heart across generations.

name: Magic of Purification, Ffpuri
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, if your vanguard is grade 3 or greater, you may [Soul-Charge 1].
flavor: It's super effective. You'll need a little courage to drink it though.

name: Marmor Ehre
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if your soul has a grade 3 card, [COST][put a grade 3 card from hand into soul], draw a card, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: In the glory of the highest sky, not a single stain is allowed.

name: Apple Witch, Cider
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted, if you have a vanguard with "Minerva" in its card name, you may return this unit to your hand. [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), if your soul has a grade 3 card with "Regalia" in its card name, this unit gets [Shield] +5000 until end of that battle.
flavor: Note the documents. The primordial wisdom has saved us from predicaments countless times.

name: Vivid Rabbit
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: The 《Genesis》 Conglomerate was once established to reverse divinations of the hopeless future.

name: Full Blown Dragon
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of your turn, if your vanguard is a [Glitter], [COST][put this unit into soul], and call up to two Plant tokens to (RC). (Plant tokens are grade 0/[Power] 5000/[Critical] 1 and have boost)
flavor: Swing the shining cane around, and that place becomes a garden.

name: Marine General of Whirling Tides, Lefteris
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your other unit [Stand] by a card's ability, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: Surge of whirling tides―― To follow the just path with a noble blade!

name: Tsunami Brave Shooter
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if you have another grade 2 or greater unit in the same column as this unit, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: Oh fools who can't see the feint. Here's the real thing. Sink!

name: Marine General of the Restless Tides, Algos
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by a unit with only 《Aqua Force》 for its clan, look at the top seven cards of your deck, choose up to one unit card with only 《Aqua Force》 for its clan or a ＜Tear Dragon＞ from among them, call it to (RC), and shuffle your deck.[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if it is the fourth battle of this turn or more, and you have a grade 3 or greater vanguard with "Maelstrom" in its card name, until end of that battle, this unit gets [Power] +5000, and "[AUTO](RC):When this unit's attack hits a vanguard, draw a card.".
flavor: The sound of the roaring sea will be passed down forever. Of the feats of an honorable marine general.

name: Signpost Fairy
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is retired from (RC) by your card's ability, if your vanguard is a [Glitter], choose one of your grade 1 or less rear-guards, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: Turn on the lights, so you wouldn't lose your way.

name: Tear Knight, Theo
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by a unit with only 《Aqua Force》 for its clan, search your deck for up to one Blue Storm Armada card, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.[CONT](RC):During your turn, if you have a vanguard with "Maelstrom" in its card name, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: To not be bothered by pain nor sacrifice. That is their duty.

name: Fierce Attack Brave Shooter
effect: [CONT](RC):During the fourth battle or more of your turn, all of your units in the same column as this unit get [Power] +5000.
flavor: Waves stacking upon waves, merging into a big surging sea.

name: Officer Cadet, Erikk
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: Make a pledge to a distant day. The sound of the waves that holds resolution.

name: Coming of Demise
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1]!Search your deck for up to one Calamity card, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor: This is an omen. That moment is drawing near before your eyes.

name: Ill-omened Transmogrification
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1]!Search your deck for up to one Calamity card, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor: This is an omen. The world is being transmogrified.

name: Beginning of The End
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1]!Search your deck for up to one Calamity card, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor: This is an omen. The end is trying to begin.

name: Peak Personage Stealth Rogue, Shojodoji
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Bind two cards with "Stealth" in their card names from soul], choose two of your opponent's (RC), bind all of the cards on the chosen (RC), and your opponent puts those cards into their hand at the end of that turn.[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put two rear-guards into soul], choose a card with "Stealth" in its card name from your bind zone, call it to (RC), and if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, that called unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Stealth Dragon, Unpreceden
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) by a card's ability, if you have a vanguard with "Tamayura" or "Shojodoji" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and draw a card.[CONT](RC):If two or more of your cards were put from (RC) into your soul this turn, this unit gets [Power] +10000.

name: Silver Thorn Dragon Tamer, Luquier
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Put a card from hand into soul], choose up to three unit cards with different grades from your soul, call them to (RC), and if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, those called units get [Power] +5000 until end of turn.[AUTO](VC):At the end of your turn, [COST][put two rear-guards into soul], and draw a card.

name: Silver Thorn, Rising Dragon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][put a card from hand into soul], and draw a card. [CONT](RC):During your turn, if you have a vanguard with "Luquier" in its card name, and two or more of your units were placed on (RC) from soul this turn, this unit gets [Power] +10000, and if four or more were placed, it gets [Power] +10000.

name: Monster Creator, Arkhite
effect: [AUTO](VC):When your rear-guard with "Monster" in its card name is placed, [COST][put a card with the same card name as that card from order zone on the bottom of deck], and that unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, if your order zone has a Research card, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and activate all of the effects below.・If your order zone has three or more Research cards, choose up to one of your rear-guards with "Monster" in its card name, and put it into your order zone.・Look at the top seven cards of your deck, choose up to one unit card with "Monster" in its card name from among them, call it to (RC), and shuffle your deck.

name: Blue Storm Dragon, Maelstrom
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Discard a card from hand], choose a unit card with only 《Aqua Force》 for its clan or a ＜Tear Dragon＞ from your soul, call it to (RC), it gets "[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, and it is the first battle of this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and [Stand] this unit." until end of turn, and at the end of that turn, put it into your soul.[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, if it is the fourth battle of this turn or more, draw a card, choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.

name: Tidal Assault

name: It's Show Time! Ririmi
effect: [AUTO]:When this card is put from soul into your drop during your turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and call this card to the back row (RC) in the same column as your front row unit with "Rarami" in its card name.[Glitter]-Tamayura[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted, put all of your rear-guards in the same column as this unit into your soul. effect: [AUTO]:When this card is put from soul into your drop during your turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and call this card to the back row (RC) in the same column as your front row unit with "Ririmi" in its card name.[Glitter]-Tamayura[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted, put all of your rear-guards in the same column as this unit into your soul. If a unit with "Ririmi" in its card name was put into your soul by this effect, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Go Ahead, Mikani
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), you may [Soul-Charge 1].[ACT](RC):If your vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][put this unit into soul], choose up to one grade 3 card with "Mikani" in its card name from your soul, and call it to (RC).[Glitter]-Kheios[CONT](Soul):When you would count the number of different card names in your soul for your card's ability, all "Go Ahead, Mikani" in your soul each count as a different card name.

effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Put a card from hand into soul], choose up to three unit cards with different grades from your soul, call them to (RC), and if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, those called units get [Power] +5000 until end of turn.[AUTO](VC):At the end of your turn, [COST][put two rear-guards into soul], and draw a card.

name: Blue Storm Dragon, Maelstrom
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Discard a card from hand], choose a unit card with only 《Aqua Force》 for its clan or a ＜Tear Dragon＞ from your soul, call it to (RC), it gets "[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, and it is the first battle of this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and [Stand] this unit." until end of turn, and at the end of that turn, put it into your soul.[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, if it is the fourth battle of this turn or more, draw a card, choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.

name: Omniscience Regalia, Minerva
effect: [CONT](VC):During your turn, if your soul has a grade 3 card with "Regalia" in its card name, all of your front row units get [Power] +5000.[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1], look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your soul.[AUTO](VC)[1/turn]:At the end of the battle this unit attacked, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 3 & discard a card with only 《Genesis》 for its clan from hand], [Stand] this unit, and it gets drive -1 until end of turn.

name: Momokke
effect: (This represents a Momokke token, and cannot be put in a deck)[ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Retire one or more of your other rear-guards], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn for each unit retired for this cost. [Glitter]-Rorowa (Active if your vanguard is a [Glitter] with "Rorowa" in its card name)[CONT](RC):If you have a unit with "Radylina" in its card name in the same column as this unit, this unit can attack from the back row.

name: Plant
effect: (This represents a plant token, and cannot be put in a deck)
